GSD.product_version: versions from v4.7 to before v5.18.4
GSD.description:
net/mlx5e: Disable softirq in mlx5e_activate_rq to avoid race condition

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.4 by commit 449357caff4f4d4b536615670ce9849d1ca9df91, it was introduced in version v4.7 by commit bc77b240b3c57236cdcc08d64ca390655d3a16ff. For more details please see the references link.
